# The stone furnace is now working and has started smelting the iron ore. It currently has 9 iron ore left, and 4 coal remaining as fuel. 
# However, my inventory shows that I have no iron plates yet because the smelting process takes some time.

# Step 14: Wait for the smelting process to complete.
# Since the REPL environment does not support real-time waiting, I will simulate checking the furnace status after some time.

# Check the furnace status again to see if it has produced any iron plates.
print(f"Checking furnace status after smelting...")  
furnace_status = get_furnace_status(furnace)  # Simulate checking the furnace status
print(f"Furnace status: {furnace_status}")  # Output the status of the furnace

# Step 15: If the furnace has produced iron plates, I will inspect the inventory again.
if furnace_status['produced'] > 0:  # Check if any iron plates were produced
    print(f"Inventory after smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")
else:
    print("No iron plates produced yet.")
